outcome: An unknown malware generates cryptic messages city-wide, causing widespread panic.

events.description: City-wide broadcast of cryptic messages begins, inciting fear and confusion among residents.
Council initiates emergency protocol to identify and eliminate the source of the malware.
Early findings suggest external involvement, sparking debates over national security and cybersecurity investments.
Authorities restore partial media control, providing reassurances but failing to quell public unrest entirely.
